|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|TP-LINK Archer C9 v1.x}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.tp-link.com/en/gpl-code.html GPL Code] ===Reviews=== * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32530-tp-link-archer-c8-ac1750-wireless-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK Archer C8'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Noted as using BCM4708, 128MB RAM 
 	TP-Link Archer C9	TP-Link Archer C8
CPU	Broadcom BCM4709	Broadcom BCM4708
Switch	In BCM4709		In BCM4708
RAM	128 MB			128 MB
Flash	16 MB			16 MB
2.4 GHz Broadcom BCM4360	Broadcom BCM4331
Radio - Skyworks PA (x3)	Unident. PA (x3)
5 GHz 	Broadcom BCM4360	Broadcom BCM4360
Radio - SiGE 5003L1 PA (x3)	SiGE 5003L1 PA (x3)
